instructions: Tap Settings in the top right corner of the app home screen. Select Add product . Scan the Nest Tag s QR code . Use your phone or tablet s camera to scan the QR code on the back of your Tag. Just point your phone or tablet s camera at the QR code. Fit the QR code into the blue box to complete the scan. Note: You won t need to switch to your phone or tablet s camera app simply scan the QR code from the Nest app. If you re having trouble scanning the QR code, see the following article for tips and an alternate setup method using the Entry Key on Tag.
